text:
1. search with the model name on hugging face.
2. get the transformer used on the model.
3. using the transformer, encode the string you want.
4. calculate the length of the outputted tensor.
The previous code snippet uses the tokenizer of google/gemma-2b LLM. 
Don’t forget to make your token secret.
Added by kamal
question: HuggingFace: How to get the number of tokens in a certain string related to a certain model on hugging face?
